Every time I replay this game I always have a good time. I've honestly played it over 100+ times on my xbox and then I got it here for portal stories: mel (which is a fantastic mod btw) but I always find it fun to just go through the test chambers all over again and feel the isolation and loneliness that it brings while also making everything feel alive. It's really strange how that can even be accomplished but it works extremely well and the story to go along with the mind-bending gameplay is just great. Everything I could ask for in a singleplayer story experience is here and it's always been my favorite game of all time. 10/10 worth every penny and I'm sure everyone else who has played this game would agree.

Portal 2 is a perfect evolution of the original Portal and an extremely solid stand alone game as well!

I initially bought Portal 2 on sale with my first batch of games on Steam. I knew nothing about it and had not played the original, or any Valve game for that matter, but a "puzzle platformer" game just sounded like fun to me. When I first started playing I was not super impressed and set the game down for a few months, but when I returned something clicked. And by the time I finished the game I considered it one of the greatest games I’d ever played, which still holds true today. 

I’ve gone back and played the original Portal and some of Valve's other games now. You probably should play the first Portal first if you care about experiencing the overall story.

The puzzles, visual presentation, voice acting, music, difficulty curve, and pretty much anything else you could think of, is handled so expertly that the entire game has an effortless and super appealing feel to it. It is atmospheric, foreboding, and challenging one minute then genuinely hilarious and relaxed the next. From start to finish the game is an absolute joy.

While the original Portal is short and can be played in just one sitting, Portal 2 is much longer and more ambitious. Both games totally achieve what they are going for, and I really appreciate the original a whole lot, but overall Portal 2 is the better game in my opinion.  

I strongly recommend Portal 2 to anyone who enjoys video games, or just anyone who enjoys solving puzzles.

Todo es mejor en Portal 2 con respecto al original, que se limitaba "como quien dice" a ser una prueba de concepto para los portales desarrollada por un grupo reducido de gente que ya había estado experimentando con ello en un juego independiente.
La historia, físicas, mecánicas y gráficos se han mejorado hasta limites insospechados. Muy muy recomendado

18年买的游戏，挺怀念的，当时我的电脑还是渣渣，玩这游戏勉强能达到60帧，当时我还基本只玩绝地求生（玩绝地求生帧数只有25帧左右，真不知道当时我是怎么坚持过来的），库存基本就是几个游戏，就是现在说的98党吧，那时的我买游戏都是先看最低配置，然后再疯狂对比自己的电脑配置，但又看的不是很懂，就放弃了很多其他优秀的游戏，能买到这个游戏都是因为我刚好有个好友玩这个游戏，到现在拥有了更多的游戏，想想都得感谢当时的好友引路，让我接触到更多好玩的游戏啊。[spoiler] 我发觉说了那么多竟然都没有这游戏的好玩之处，哈哈，反倒是怀念起来自己游玩steam的过程了[/spoiler]
This game is a great puzzle game and it can really work the mind without bordom and it has a very great storyline as well.
